GenAiFunction.description: - Use this action to explore the Custom Objects, Fields and Relationships in this org. - If you need to find unknown Custom Objects or verify the object names use the "allObjects" scope first which will give you a list of object API names with friendly labels. - If you need to find Custom Fields and find out how Custom objects are related to other Custom or Standard objects use the "objectDetails" scope. - The "objectDetails" scope allows a comma-separated list of Object API names and returns field API names with their friendly labels. - Only use "objectDetails" when you are sure an object name actually exists.
